general.description:
The first Arythem planetary colony is an endearing waterworld, well suitable for a Clan founded by Arythem ud Irol, the famous maritime explorer.
It has been settled by crude sublight ships and prompted the Arythem-Irmothem "race for the stars" that took place just after the birth of the Irilia Clan.
The three planets Hathil, Ud Nurn and ... are called "The three fingers".
Up to now, it is one of the most populated world of the entire Rith Sphere and an industrial center essential to Arythem commerce.
general.bar: Many Rithai seafarers and a few spacers, along with some tourists of all species
